item.description:
Karaoke this week on Thursday @Valentinos in Hudson!

From traditional old world Italian classics, to succulent steaks, burgers, and seafood, to hand tossed pizzas, and hand crafted deserts.  Their extensive menu of homemade favorites is designed to satisfy everyone in the family.  I loooove their Cheese Ravioli Parmigiana!  Great appetizers, I had cheese fries the other night, but I _never_ have cheese fries!  They let me swap to mozzarella and marinara sauce and begat Italian Cheese Fries! :-D

The DJ  does a great job and they have a great group of regulars. They love the Meetup group when we come to Karaoke Night! You can sing and dance and eat; be part of our big group songs like Love Shack and Paradise by the Dashboard Light (only place to have _4_ microphones!); or just watch and cheer/laugh us on! They'll have the big TVs on local games as well.

Valentinos is on Lowell Road in Hudson, take the Exit 2 Bridge from Nashua, to Lowell Road and go up about a mile.  Or 111 thru Nashua, onto Lowell Road south about 2 miles. We'll start at 8:30, karaoke is at 9, til closing around 1!. We'll probably be in the booths next to the bar or the tables around it. So don't be afraid to come late if you have to.

Tom D'A cell 603-521-8392

From traditional old world Italian classics, to succulent steaks, burgers, and seafood, to hand tossed pizzas, and hand crafted deserts.  Our extensive menu of homemade favorites is designed to satisfy everyone in the family.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll probably be in the booths next to the bar or the tables around it.
item.name: Valentinos for Thursday Night Karaoke, Hudson
